body_html:
This is the jupyter we are talking about: http://jupyter.org/
We use this to run most of the tutorials. It is a neat learning tool.
But this is something I never really used myself.

I like the new image idea better. If it were up to me, I would have a CPU only image that has jupyter for tutorials. @random-forests @wolffg @MarkDaoust what do you think?
Are you OK with us creating a completely separate docker image with Jupyter?
Do we even need GPU support for the image with jupyter?

But this is something I never really used myself.

body:
This is the jupyter we are talking about: http://jupyter.org/
We use this to run most of the tutorials. It is a neat learning tool.
But this is something I never really used myself.

I like the new image idea better. If it were up to me, I would have a CPU only image that has jupyter for tutorials. @random-forests @wolffg @MarkDaoust what do you think?
Are you OK with us creating a completely separate docker image with Jupyter?
Do we even need GPU support for the image with jupyter?
